property.name: contourOptions
property.shortdesc: The contour of the text wrap. Valid only when when text wrap type is contour.

property.name: userModifiedWrap
property.shortdesc: If true, the text wrap path has been explicitly modified by the user.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the TextWrapPreference (a PageItem, HtmlItem, FormField, SignatureField, TextBox, RadioButton, ListBox, ComboBox, CheckBox, MultiStateObject, Button, MediaItem, Sound, Movie, EPSText, SplineItem, Polygon, GraphicLine, Rectangle, Oval, Graphic, ImportedPage, PICT, WMF, PDF, EPS, Image, Group, TextFrame, Application, Document or ObjectStyle).

property.name: textWrapOffset
property.shortdesc: The minimum space between text and the edges of the wrapped object. The format for defining text wrap offset values depends on the text wrap type. If text wrap type is jump object text wrap, specify 2 values in the format [top, bottom]. If text wrap type is next column text wrap or contour, specify a single value. For bounding box text wrap, specify 4 values in the format in the format [top, left, bottom, right]. . Can return: Unit, Array of Units or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: inverse
property.shortdesc: If true, inverts the text wrap.

property.name: applyToMasterPageOnly
property.shortdesc: If true, text wraps on the master spread apply to that spread only, and not to any pages the master spread has been applied to.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextWrapPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
